parameters.name: IndicatorIndex
parameters.description: One-based index of Gtol frame indicator to set

parameters.name: BorderType
parameters.description: Type of border as defined by swGtolIndicatorBorderType_e

parameters.name: TolType
parameters.description: Tolerance type as defined by swGtolGeomCharSymbol_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Datum
parameters.description: Datum feature symbol that refers to the BorderType

title: IGtolFrame.SetIndicator
description: Sets the indicator border type, tolerance type, and datum at the specified indicator index on the right side of this Gtol frame.
signature:
System.Boolean SetIndicator( 
   System.Int32
IndicatorIndex
,
   System.Int32
BorderType
,
   System.Int32
TolType
,
   System.String
Datum
)

parameters.name: IndicatorIndex
parameters.description: One-based index of Gtol frame indicator to set

parameters.name: BorderType
parameters.description: Type of border as defined by swGtolIndicatorBorderType_e

parameters.name: TolType
parameters.description: Tolerance type as defined by swGtolGeomCharSymbol_e (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Datum
parameters.description: Datum feature symbol that refers to the BorderType

returns: True if indicator successfully set, false if not
remarks:
Before calling this method, use
IGtolFrame:GetIndicatorCount
to determine IndicatorIndex.
TolType may be one of only swGtolGeomCharSymbol_e.:
swGcsANG
swGcsPARALLEL
swGcsPERP
swGcsCIRCRUNOUT
swGcsSYMMETRY
